0.2.name: wordpress/fytch-comments
0.2.description:
Fytch is a fully featured plugin that provides comment publishing to http://fytch.com It allows to assign a Fytch topic to each post so that wordpress comments are co-published under the appropriate topic on http://fytch.com. It not only allows to publish comments to http://fytch.com but to Twitter, FriendFeed and Facebook as well.

Fytch is mainly written by Oliver Krohne
